isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - ENGINE ELECTRICAL - Main Engine Wiring Harness - Installation

caution.para: To avoid engine damage, use a ribbed seal when assembling a connector. A connector assembled without the appropriate ribbed seal may become contaminated with moisture. Terminal corrosion may result, resulting in a poor electrical connection.

Before installing the connector, make sure each connector has its ribbed seal in place. In some cases, upon disassembly, a ribbed seal may pull off of its connector and remain in the mating socket of a sensor or actuator.

note.para: See the REMOVAL procedure for the locations of each sensor.

step1.para: Lay the wiring harness on the engine.
Carefully align the wiring harness connectors with the sensors and actuators. Push each connector into its mating socket until the locking tabs are fully latched.
Use the nut to connect the glow plug terminal to the relay.
Install the wiring harness routing clips at the proper locations.
Install the 31-pin connector in its mounting bracket. Align the notch in the connector with the tab in its corresponding bracket. Install and tighten the locking nut.

note.para: Refer to Section 4, CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES, for glow plug and under valve cover connections.

warning.para: To avoid engine damage, serious personal injury or possibly death when reconnecting the batteries, always connect the ground terminal last. Always wear eye protection when working around batteries.

step1.para: Connect the main negative cable to the batteries.
